webDeveloperIntern.title: Web Developer Intern
description: HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript: Developed responsive and dynamic web pages.
MySQL: Worked with database management, queries, and data manipulation.
Collaborated with colleagues and mentors to enhance problem-solving and teamwork skills.
Applied version control using Git to manage project versions and changes.

mobileDeveloperIntern.title: Mobile Developer Intern
description: Developed an iOS application called 'Sweater Shop.'
MVC Architecture: Followed the Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern to maintain clean and organized code.

businessAnalyticsIntern.title: Business Analytics Intern
description: Applied SQL and Microsoft Excel for data processing and analysis.
Conducted exploratory data analysis on retail data to identify key insights.
Created an interactive Tableau dashboard to visualize data and results.
